Meet Matatalab Hands-on Coding Robots

For School

Educational Coding Robot Sets

  • For Grades PreK-4
  • Certificated with Education Alliance Finland
  • Member of European Schoolnet

For Home

Entry level Coding Robot Sets

  • For Age 3-9
  • Learning through play
  • With family storybooks

Easy to Use

CODING&PRO LITE
  • 1

    Put MatataBot on the starting point .

  • 2

    Combine coding blocks on the control board.

  • 3

    Command tower performs image recognition and sends the instruction to the MatataBot.

  • 4

    MatataBot receives this instruction and onwards to the goal.

  • 5

    Put MatataBot on the starting point .

  • 6

    Combine coding blocks on the control board.

  • 7

    Command tower performs image recognition and sends the instruction to the MatataBot.

  • 8

    MatataBot receives this instruction and onwards to the goal.
